author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Adds express and prompt customizations for Run3 MWGR cosmics workflows 138.1 and 138.2, thus improving realism.

#### PR validation:

Run `runTheMatrix.py -l 138.1,138.2` successfully.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

NA
title: improve realism of Run3 cosmics workflows
